DOC.brief_summary: To develop implement quality improvement program treatment acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) China base successful experience AHA-Get Guidelines program . This two-year program use data collection , analysis , feedback , process improvement extend use evidence-based guideline throughout healthcare system improve patient care acute coronary syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized patient discharge diagnosis acute coronary syndrome ( include STEMI , NSTEMI UAP ) November 2014 June 2016
